# Paper Template

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

I occasionally write papers, I also occasionally write them in R Markdown, and post code to github. 
This is an effort to minimise repetition of dumb set-up tasks. 


First steps should be update the licence e.g. using `usethis::use_ccby_license()`
